Name: Strawb
About the game: Strawb is a puzzle game that combines platformer and puzzle elements in a hand-drawn comic style. Your goal is to reach your friend by clever movement and destruction of blocks. . Use interesting abilities and mechanics like teleportation or lasers to master all 50 unique puzzles. - 50 unique puzzles with increasing difficulty. - Mechanics such as teleportation, lasers and moving entire rows of blocks. - Hand-painted comic style graphics. - Global best times for each level. . Future new levels will be included. - Brain training ;) Will you solve the puzzles and catch your friend by cleverly combining all the mechanics? Try it out! About me I am a solo indiedev working on game development during my free time as a hobby. Enjoy Strawb ;)
